name: Monty's Way Home
description:
Monty the Python is just a little guy who want's to go home, but he needs your help. He's not sure where to go and he's also a bit to big to fit inside. Help Monty get home by navigating to his pink house and finding a way to rewind his size to get him inside.

Controls:
  • Movement: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Restart level: R key
